div.p: This project is a concrete implementation of Mevenide Core for Netbeans. See the features list to learn more about Mevenide for Netbeans.
It works with Netbeans 3.5 and later, JDK 1.4.1 and Maven 1.0-rc2. Please note that JDK 1.4+ is required since Java 1.4 regex Engine is used. The snapshot release can be downloaded.

The module is not actively developed anymore, since it's targeted at 3.x series of Netbeans which will be shortly replaced by Netbeans 4.0. The new Netbeans version has a completely rewritten project support and currently time and effort is put into integration with future 4.0.
There is another Netbeans module that adds code completion to Maven related xml files. It's a lightweight module independent of the rest of mevenide. For details, go to Mevenide Grammar module
